articles.content: Peter Morgans show The Crown grew out of his play The Audience, in which I played Thatcher. I couldnt resist the role. I was madly prepping for my first table read, in the kitchen, and my then-partne… [+1377 chars]

articles.description: Britney Spears lost her latest conservatorship battle against her father. There are some fans who believe she's being held against her will.

articles.title: Alex Trebek’s Wife Jean Breaks Her Silence on His Death - E! NEWS
articles.description: Jean Trebek has spoken out after her husband, Jeopardy! host Alex Trebek, died on Sunday following his fight with cancer. See her heartfelt thanks to fans below.
articles.content:
Jean Trebek is feeling the love from the worldwide Jeopardy! family.

articles.description: New York City's annual Macy's Thanksgiving Day parade will feature pre-taped Broadway performances, the Rockettes and Santa Claus this year, but there will be no live audience.
